alert.note: Alert for Taliaferro; Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 5:21AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Little River near Washington affecting Wilkes and Taliaferro Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little River near Washington. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 19 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding occurs in the woodlands and fields along the river upstream and downstream from the gage at Lundberg Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 19 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 19.1 feet on 05/01/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
